person.bio: A loving, kind, explorer fully dedicating her professional path to build a sustainable foundaton for the future. Kristine is a compassionate innovator, founder, advisor, sustainable development advocate, adding value by unlocking power of diversity, simplicity and genuinity towards complex challenges assuring that a positive net impact on the planet is a norm.
person.excerpt: A loving, kind, explorer building a sustainable foundaton for the future.

node.title: ThreeFold Foundation
node.excerpt: The ThreeFold Foundation along with its partners is growing the ThreeFold Grid and a new peer-to-peer internet.
